content.text: Hi there!  How are you today?
I'm doing great! I just started a new job at McDonald's last week and I'm really enjoying it so far.
That's great to hear! I'm glad you're enjoying your new job. I work at a non profit that helps children and I love my job too.
That's wonderful! I'm sure you're making a big difference in the lives of children.
I hope so! I try my best to make sure that the children we help are happy and healthy.
That's really great. I'm sure the children you help appreciate it a lot.
What are some of your hobbies?
I love to run and I also like to watch movies.
I love to run too! I'm not very good at it, but I enjoy it. What's your favorite movie?
I love the movie Good Burger. It's so funny and I love the cast.
I've never seen that movie! I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a classic.
